collection:
This Privacy Policy describes how Twelve Data collects, uses and discloses
information, and what choices you have with respect to the information.

Personal Data We Collect

Among the types of Personal Data that Twelve Data collects, by itself or
through third parties, there are: Cookies; Usage Data; first name; last name;
company name; email address; various types of Data; password.

Personal Data may be freely provided by the User, or, in case of Usage Data,
collected automatically when using Twelve Data.

Unless specified otherwise, all Data requested by Twelve Data is mandatory and
failure to provide this Data may make it impossible for Twelve Data to provide
its services.

Any use of Cookies – or of other tracking tools – by Twelve Data or by the
owners of third-party services used by Twelve Data serves the purpose of
providing the Service required by the User, in addition to any other purposes
described in the present document and in the Cookie Policy, if available.

How We Use Personal Data

The Data concerning the User is collected to allow the Twelve Data to provide
its Service, comply with its legal obligations, respond to enforcement
requests, protect its rights and interests (or those of its Users or third
parties), detect any malicious or fraudulent activity, as well as the
following: Handling payments, Analytics, Contacting the User, Data transfer
outside the EU, Displaying content from external platforms, Hosting and
backend infrastructure, Registration and authentication provided directly by
Twelve Data, SPAM protection, Tag Management and Traffic optimization and
distribution.

Google utilizes the Data collected to track and examine the use of Twelve
Data, to prepare reports on its activities and share them with other Google
services.

Google may use the Data collected to contextualize and personalize the ads of
its own advertising network.
Personal Data processed: Cookies; Usage Data.

In
general and unless where otherwise stated, Users are requested to provide
their payment details and personal information directly to such payment
service providers.

Personal Data processed: various types of Data as specified in the privacy
policy of the service.
Category of personal data collected according to CCPA: internet information.

Personal Data processed: various types of Data as specified in the privacy
policy of the service.
Category of personal data collected according to CCPA: internet information.

Personal Data shall be processed and stored for as long as required by the
purpose they have been collected for.

We may provide you with disclosures and alerts
regarding the Privacy Policy or Personal Data collected by posting them on our
website and, if you are a User, by contacting you through your Twelve Data
Dashboard, email address and/or the physical address listed in your Twelve
Data account.
sharing:
This Privacy Policy describes how Twelve Data collects, uses and discloses
information, and what choices you have with respect to the information.

How We Disclose Personal Data

Twelve Data does not sell or rent Personal Data to marketers or unaffiliated
third parties.
We share your Personal Data with trusted entities.

In some cases, the Data may be accessible to certain types of
persons in charge, involved with the operation of Twelve Data (administration,
sales, marketing, legal, system administration) or external parties (such as
third-party technical service providers, mail carriers, hosting providers, IT
companies, communications agencies) appointed, if necessary, as Data
Processors by us.

Google utilizes the Data collected to track and examine the use of Twelve
Data, to prepare reports on its activities and share them with other Google
services.

Depending on the User's location, data transfers may involve transferring the
User's Data to a country other than their own.
